Research Member

Results of Research and Development

  • Built a PWM audio amplifier.
  • Test amplifier for performance to specifications.
  • Learn relevant regulations for instrumentation and emissions testing for Class A and Class B.
  • Recognize situation that increase/decrease emissions.
  • Work with a team to prepare and test a commercial product to meet a specified compliance goal.
